articles.author: Harvey Randall
articles.title: 3 days after Helldivers 2 dev's CEO denied the existence of heavy machine guns, they now exist: Introducing the LAS-99 Quasar Cannon and the MG-101 Heavy Machine Gun - PC Gamer
articles.content: Earlier this week, the CEO of Helldivers 2 studio Arrowhead Games flatly denied the existence of heavy machine guns—Johan Pilestedt has track record of being tongue-in-cheek, though it's not clear wh… [+2442 chars]

articles.author: Evan Gough
articles.title: In a Distant Solar System, the JWST Sees the End of Planet Formation - Universe Today
articles.description: Planet formation is ending around a distant young protostar. The planet-forming gas in the star's disk is being dispersed into space.
articles.content: Every time a star forms, it represents an explosion of possibilities. Not for the star itself; its fate is governed by its mass. The possibilities it signifies are in the planets that form around it.… [+7222 chars]
